A plea to an appeale trauersed dialogue wise. By H.B. Burton, Henry, 1578-1648.
[24], 93, [3] p.
By W. I[ones], Printed at London : 1626.
H.B. = Henry Burton. A reply to: Montagu, Richard. Appello Caesarem. Printer's name from STC. The last leaf is blank. This edition has errata on A4r and N3r; the heart in the title page woodcut is upside-down. Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
=======
